title: Address: ADDRESS
name: address
description:
The
element contains such information as address, signature and authorship, often at the beginning or end of the body of a document. Typically, the
element is rendered in an italic typeface and may be indented. Example of use:
Newsletter editor
J.R. Brown
JimquickPost News, Jimquick, CT 01234
Tel (123) 456 7890
